overview: Mr. Cohn co-founded uControl and is responsible for engineering. Prior to uControl, he was at Motive and served in several capacities; Director of Technology and Lead Architect for Motive’s Consumer line of products and Senior Developer after originally joining Motive as the seventh employee. At Motive, Mr. Cohn was responsible for engineering highly scalable enterprise class server platfroms that supported up to 18 million end users in a single deployment. Prior to joining Motive, he was with Tivoli Systems as a lead developer for various components of the Tivoli product line. Before this tenure at Tivoli, Mr. Cohn was a software developer at Arrowsmith Technologies and IBM. Mr. Cohn has more that 18 years of experience in designing and developing highly scalable, distributed software systems. He holds a Bachelor of Arts in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Austin.
